general_advisory: Harvest rice crops which have reached 85% maturity and dry to 14% moisture. Grow short-duration Rabi crops and conduct pest surveillance regularly. Apply micronutrients for micronutrient deficiency.

advisory: Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly and take appropriate plant protection measures accordingly.
Farmers are advised to grow short-duration Rabi crops like Green gram, Black gram, Cowpea, Field pea, Lentil using available soil moisture.
Sugarcane is at grand growth stage to ripening stage.
Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19 and PU 30 for green gram.
Grow high yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19 and PU 30 for black gram.
Use groundnut varieties suitable to Odisha conditions like Kalinga groundnut 101, Devi, for one acre 40 kernel is required.
To manage wilt and rot disease in Brinjal and Tomato, drench the root zone with a solution of Plantomycin.
To manage wilt and rot disease in Brinjal and Tomato, drench the root zone with a solution of Plantomycin.
To manage thrips infestation, install Blue sticky traps at 8 nos./acre.
To manage Red Spider Mites in flowers like Marigold and Rose, spray wettable sulphur 80% WP.
To manage Red Spider Mites in flowers like Marigold and Rose, spray wettable sulphur 80% WP.
During winters, various fungal, bacterial, and parasitic diseases may appear in fish. Treat the pond with CIFAX.
